name: Snake 3D: Square Madness
description: Nothing complicated, an iconic snake, but with 3D graphics and new features!  Your task is to collect food and get points for it, while the snake will grow! The game has a local mode for two players. Let's remember our childhood! The game has 3 levels: Green glade - the simplest, the main obstacle is the map borders. Sand valley - the difficulty of the level is a crawling worm that tries to eat you. Watch out! Electric madness - local mode. In it, you can play with your friend locally! You can also rate support me on other platforms: YouTube • Instagram • Twitter You can share your progress in the comments! I will be very interested to learn about your achievements. Thank you for your time and support!
